::Galaxor::

Galaxor is hit by the punch, stumbling back. He sees Abominus being
hit by the missile and thrown forward. Sidestepping, Galaxor puts a
hand on Abominus's back, pushing him away and then spinning around and
swinging his sword at him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: sure thing Alloran =P
> 
> ::Divebomb/Abominus::
> 
>  Divebomb catches the missiles out of the corner of his eagle eyes. 
> He quickly spins, firing on the missiles and destroying them, using 
> the large explosion as cover for three particle rifle blasts which 
> emerge from behind the cloud at Element(G). As the cloud 
> disipates, Divebomb appears, holding his particle rifle aiming at 
> Element(G).
> 
> --------------------
> 
> Abominus roars, he throws two fist forward at Galaxor's chest as 
> Galaxor's sword smashes into his shoulder, cutting a small groove. 
> Two missiles him Abominus from behind pushing him even faster 
> toward Galaxor, but he ignores them. "Crrrruuuusshshhhhh." 
> rumbles his massive voice.
> 
> 
> On 14 Apr 2001, at 10:18, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> 
> > OOC: Its your turn to use Abominus, rauq.
> > 
> > :::Vulois/Ramjet/Falcon/Snare:::
> > 
> > ::Vulois hears the voice in the distance::
> > Vulois: Who are you?
> > ~~~~~
> > ::Ramjet gets Neody's transmission::
> > Ramjet: Don't worry Neody, i'll send Falcon and Snare over. 
Falcon, Snare.
> > Falcon: Yes?
> > Ramjet i want the two of you to go to Neody's postion and make
sure nothing 
> > harms him.
> > Snare: It shall be done!
> > ::Falcon and Snare head to Neody's position::
> > Falcon: So, whats the problem?
> >
